price: They said, “We will never cease to worship it until Moses comes back to us.”
arabic: قَالُواْ لَن نَّبۡرَحَ عَلَيۡهِ عَٰكِفِينَ حَتَّىٰ يَرۡجِعَ إِلَيۡنَا مُوسَىٰ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
